= Introduction =

In version 1.4.3 were added the following new features: Transfer Zone discovery, Wildcard testing, Internal wordlist.

Only for use the Zone Transfer option (-zt) you must install the module <a href="http://www.dnspython.org/">dnspython</a>, otherwise you can do without.
_This version does not support the output file option._

= Details =

<h3>Usage:</h3>
  <b>Scanning with <u>internal</u> wordlist:</b>

  <code>$ python knock.py <url></code>

  <b>Scanning with <u>external</u> wordlist:</b>

  <code>$ python knock.py <url> <wordlist></code>


<h3>Options:</h3>

  <b>-zt</b> <u>Zone Transfer discovery:</u>

  <code>$ python -zt knock.py <url></code>


  <b>-wc</b> <u>Wildcard testing:</u>

  <code>$ python -wc knock.py <url></code>

  <b>-dns</b> <u>Dns resolver:</u>

  <code>$ python -dns knock.py <url></code>

= Executable on Linux =
 <a href="http://code.google.com/p/knock/downloads/list">Download knock</a> and extract file _knock.py_

 From shell command:
 <code>$ sudo cp knock.py /usr/bin/knock</code>
 <code>$ sudo chmod a+x /usr/bin/knock</code>

 Now you can use knock as shown in the examples.

= Examples =
 <b>Scanning with <u>internal</u> wordlist</b>

 <code>$ knock _domain.com_</code>

 <b>Scanning with <u>external</u> wordlist</b>

 <code>$ knock _domain.com wordlist.txt_</code>

 <b>Zone Transfer discovery (-zt)</b>

 <code>$ knock -zt _domain.com_</code>

 <b>Wildcard testing (-wc)</b>

 <code>$ knock -wc _domain.com_</code>

 <b>Dns resolver (-dns)</b>

 <code>$ knock -dns _domain.com_</code>


_You do not understand how to use knock? Back to play with the Xbox!_
